captions.text: So as you already know, Kpop is really, really huge in Korea
Lots of dancing is really in style.
BO PEEP BO PEEP BO PEEP BO PEEP BO PEEP BO PEEP BO PEEP AAH
But there's a whole other culture that exists in Korea,
and that's b-boying.  We're here at the World Master's Championship
It's 2010, and we're gonna check out some of the action inside.
Yo, what's up, this is Salajin from Terror Bunch Crew, Germany.  Thanks.  Peace.
Yo, what's up.  My name is Caster.  Evolution!  Yeah!
See, y'all been sayin that Martina can dance better than me,
But you don't really know that I can breakdance, myself
